byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and MERNA THOMAS

abstract: Reports conflict over who is responsible for fatal shooting of 15 Sudanese migrants trying to enter Israel from Egypt; conflict in northern Sinai has made area even more treacherous for refugees, who human rights groups claim have endured torture and sexual abuse after fleeing violence in their home countries.
lead_paragraph: One account said the migrants had been shot by the Egyptian police for trying to cross the border, but another said they had been caught in the middle of a shootout with smugglers.

headline.main: 15 Sudanese Migrants Killed at Egypt-Israel Border, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: 15 Are Killed at Border in Egypt, Officials Say

snippet: One account said the migrants had been shot by the Egyptian police for trying to cross the border, but another said they had been caught in the middle of a shootout with smugglers.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject
